dc_title_s: Theoretical Poverty Investment Strategy for Locations in Kenya, 1999
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains estimates for the minimum amount (in Kenyan Shillings) needed per square kilometer per month to close the poverty gap for locations of Kenya, 1999.This data was used in Map 2.9 in Nature's Benefits: An Atlas of Ecosystems and Human Well-Being in Kenya.
